roleset.name: promenade
roleset.note: PROMENADE-V NOTES: hand-checked by Kevin (from promenade.01-v)

role.descr: causer of promenading, agent, transitive subject
thing promendaded, theme, intransitive subject, ditransitive object

example.name: promenade-v: intransitive
example.text: They promenaded down the red carpet under escort of a Marine Corps color guard.
example.arg: under escort of a Marine Corps color guard
